version_description:
*Required iOS version has been raised to iOS 8 and later from this version.
*Game Center support.
*New feature to copy save data to iCloud.
*SOUND LIBRARY now supports background playback.
*Other minor bug fix.

*Required iOS version has been raised to iOS 10 and later from this version.
*Other minor bug fix.

*Required iOS version has been raised to iOS 11 and later from this version.
*Fixed a bug that caused apps to crash on some devices with iOS 13.
